songs.title: Blue Lipstick
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: TeeFlii]
Uh, shit
Uh, ill man
Lotta niggas out there jockin' my style and hatin' on me
'Cause they don't do it like me though
And they, never know

[Verse 1: TeeFlii]
Trust me and me, girl (uh), I will never break your heart (for real)
'Cause girl you, you been down (shit), you been down from the start (oh God)
You know where the best at (it's certain) and you know I, yeah (uh)
Every time you leave me (yeah), I know that you're coming right back to me, right back to me (oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, straight up)
Girl, you know, you know (uh)
Every time that we have sex (uh), I give it, I give it, I give it

[Chorus: TeeFlii]
I give it to you how you want it (uh), you want it (shit), we gon' do it every way, every way you want it (oh)
You look sexy wearing that blue lipstick, blue lipstick, blue lipstick
You look sexy wearing that blue lipstick, you look sexy, you, you, you
Girl, you looking so, looking so damn sexy wearing that blue

[Verse 2: Chris Brown & (TeeFlii)]
Sexy lingerie (yeah), you gon' come over when you need that (need that), girl, put it on me, don't play it (never, ever)
'Cause I'm gon' put it in the right places, 'cause you gon' wind it for me (then wind), then unwind it for me (yeah)
'Cause you do everything I like (uh) and girl, I do everything you like (tell the truth)
I'm gon' have you fiending for more, you like it doggy style, don't ya?
Every time that we have sex, I give it, I give it, I give it (I give it, I give it)

[Chorus: Chris Brown  & (TeeFlii)]
I'll give it to you how you want it (hey, yeah), you want it
We gon' do it every way you want it (every way, hey)
You look sexy wearing that blue lipstick, blue lipstick, blue lipstick (you look sexy wearing your)
Girl, you looking so, looking so damn sexy wearing that blue (yurn up)

[Bridge: Chris Brown]
Baby, that blue, ayy, ayy (yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, oh, woah, yeah)
Baby, I, yeah yeah (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Shit, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (uh)
Oh, shit, oh wee

[Chorus: TeeFlii]
I'll give it to you how you want it (how you want it), you want it
We gon' do it every way you want it (every way, you look sexy wearing, straight up)
You look sexy wearing that blue lipstick, you, blue lipstick
Girl, you looking so, girl, you looking so, looking so damn sexy wearing that blue

[Outro: TeeFlii]
Nigga killer
We got a bond that can ever, ever be broken
Ill man everything, everything ill man, hoe
I don't know what the fuck you though this was
But fire us, fire you, every day, every day
